type.name: draughting_approval_item
type.description: A drawing or drawing sheet that is approved.

entity.name: Draughting_approval_assignment
entity.description:
The assignment of an approval to one or more drawings or drawing sheets.
This ARM entity embodies the requirements of Approval_assignment. in the Approval module. However, Draughting_approval_assignment has not been made a subtype of Approval_assignment, because the corresponding MIM entity is taken from ISO 10303-505 'Drawing structure and administration', and is not a subtype of applied_approval_assignment. This would contradict the mapping in the Approval module.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: The drawings or drawing sheets that are approved.

description.p: A Drawing_revision is a particular revision of a drawing.
description.note: The information that shall be recorded for a Drawing_revision is specified by ISO 10303-505 'Drawing structure and administration'

description.p: A Drawing_sheet_revision is the specification of a particular revision of a drawing sheet.
description.note: The information that shall be recorded for a Drawing_sheet_revision is specified by ISO 10303-505 'Drawing structure and administration'
